sentence.Network_en: Risks of assembly occupancies have source complicacy, intrinsical dualism, effect ponderance, limited calculability and spatiotemporal characteristics.

list.abs: 惠州安全生产管理监督... ... 2.3 安全生产 safety production 2.4 本质安全 intrinsic safety 2.6 职业安全 occupational safety.

内在价值（intrinsic value）源自核心产品或服务本身。在某些情况下，这种形式的产品价值可能不会马上显现出来。
而内含价值(Intrinsic Value)对买权而言，是指「现货价格高于履约价的部份」，对卖权而言，刚好相反，即「履约价高于现货价的部 …
而内在动机（intrinsic motivation）和外在动机（extrinsic motivation）是另一个经典的理论模式，内在动机指的是为了从语言学习活 …

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to a thing by its very nature;

sentences.sentence: "form was treated as something intrinsic, as the very essence of the thing"- John Dewey
